plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need sunshine and water to grow.
🐰 Bunnies love to munch on me.
🥗 You can eat me in a salad.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have leaves that change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb up me.
🪵 You can make paper from me.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌺 I come in many different colors.
💐 People give me as gifts.
🌼 You can find me in a garden.

plant.question: I am long and yellow/green and grow in bunches on a tree-like plant. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am a fruit.
💛 I am often yellow when ripe.
🌴 I grow on a tropical plant.

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a plant. You can make ketchup from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am a fruit that many people think is a vegetable.
🥪 I taste good on sandwiches.
🪴 I grow best in warm sunshine.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels like to bury me in the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I am a type of nut.
🍂 You can find me in the fall.
🐿️ Some animals store me for the winter.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often covered in butter and salt.
🌽 I come from a tall plant.
🔥 I need heat to become my puffy self.

plant.question: I have needles instead of leaves and stay green all year long. You can decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 I am a type of evergreen.
⭐ People put lights on me.
🌲 I smell like pine.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in the desert and often have sharp spines. Be careful not to touch me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I can store a lot of water.
☀️ I like hot, dry places.
🏜️ I don't need much rain.

plant.question: I am a type of plant that grows in the water. I have big, round leaves that float. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Frogs like to sit on me.
💧 I grow in ponds and lakes.
🌸 I sometimes have pretty flowers.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and I have fins. I say, 'blub, blub'! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I live in water.
🐠 I am a kind of animal.
🐡 I am not a whale or a shark.

ocean.question: I am very big and salty water. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 Big boats use me.
🧂 I taste salty.
🌊 I have lots of waves.

ocean.question: I am a home made of shells and sand that you find on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ I’m built near water.
🏖️ I use small materials.
🦀 I may be home to crabs.

ocean.question: I live in a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I crawl, I don't run.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥗 I might eat your lettuce in the garden.

ocean.question: I am a very big animal that lives in the ocean. I have a big tail and I sing a song. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am a mammal.
🌊 I am bigger than a fish.
🎶 Some people say I have a beautiful voice.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squeeze through small spaces. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 I can change colors.
💪 I have lots of arms to grab things with.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with sharp teeth. People are afraid of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many sharp teeth.
🦈 I am a predator.
🔪 Sometimes people make movies about me being scary.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish, but also a yummy snack. I swim in a school in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🍣 I am often used in sushi.
🐟 I am a popular type of fish.
🌈 I am often pink or red.

ocean.question: I am a slow creature that looks like a rock but is actually an animal that is often brightly coloured and can be seen on a coral reef. What am I?

hints.text: 🪨 I look like a plant.
🐢 I am an animal that doesn't move much.
🌈 I come in many colours.

ocean.question: I am a small, bright fish that can be found living in the tentacles of a sea anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🤡 I am named after a performer in a circus.
🧡 I am often orange and white.
🏠 The sea anemone is my safe home.
